item.title: Native American Community Center Comedy Pilot Not Moving Forward at NBC
item.description: NBC has opted not to move forward with the single-cam comedy pilot set at a Native American community center, Variety has learned. The news comes one day after NBC announced a series pickup for &#8220

item.title: ‘The Voice’ Sets Adam Levine, John Legend and Kelly Clarkson as Season 29 Coaches
item.description: The long-running NBC show will also revamp its format somewhat for the spring 2026 edition.

item.title: Cheerleading Comedy ‘Stumble’ Lands NBC Series Order
item.description: Jenn Lyon stars in the show as the coach of a community college’s cheer squad.

item.title: NBC Orders Cheerleading Comedy ‘Stumble’ to Series
